name: user_create
description: Allows a user to create another user

name: user_list
description: Allows a user to get a list of users and get info about a single user

name: user_delete
description: Allows a user to delete other users or his own account

name: token_create
description: Allows a user to create a token for himself or other users, overwrites the old token

name: token_create_self
description: Allows a user to create a new token for himself, overwrites the old token

name: token_delete
description: Allows a user to delete a token
